member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.BankCardOCR(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to detect and recognize key fields such as the card number, bank information, and expiration date on mainstream bank cards in Mainland China.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.BankCardOCRSync(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to detect and recognize key fields such as the card number, bank information, and expiration date on mainstream bank cards in Mainland China.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.GeneralAccurateOCR(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to detect and recognize characters in an image. It can recognize Chinese, English, Chinese-English, digits, and special symbols and return the text box positions and characters.
It is suitable for scenarios with a lot of characters in complex layouts and requiring high recognition accuracy, such as examination papers, online images, signboards, and legal documents.
Strengths: compared with general print recognition, it provides higher-precision character recognition services. Its accuracy and recall rate are higher in difficult scenarios such as a large number of characters, long strings of digits, small characters, blurry characters, and tilted text.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.GeneralAccurateOCRSync(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to detect and recognize characters in an image. It can recognize Chinese, English, Chinese-English, digits, and special symbols and return the text box positions and characters.
It is suitable for scenarios with a lot of characters in complex layouts and requiring high recognition accuracy, such as examination papers, online images, signboards, and legal documents.
Strengths: compared with general print recognition, it provides higher-precision character recognition services. Its accuracy and recall rate are higher in difficult scenarios such as a large number of characters, long strings of digits, small characters, blurry characters, and tilted text.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.GeneralBasicOCR(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to detect and recognize characters in an image in the following 20 languages: Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Vietnamese, Malay, Russian, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Finnish, Danish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Thai, and Arabic. Mixed characters in English and each supported language can be recognized together.
It can recognize printed text in paper documents, online images, ads, signboards, menus, video titles, profile photos, etc.
Strengths: it can automatically recognize the text language, return the text box coordinate information, and automatically rotate tilted text to the upright direction.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.GeneralBasicOCRSync(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to detect and recognize characters in an image in the following 20 languages: Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Vietnamese, Malay, Russian, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Finnish, Danish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Thai, and Arabic. Mixed characters in English and each supported language can be recognized together.
It can recognize printed text in paper documents, online images, ads, signboards, menus, video titles, profile photos, etc.
Strengths: it can automatically recognize the text language, return the text box coordinate information, and automatically rotate tilted text to the upright direction.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.HKIDCardOCR(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.HKIDCardOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to recognize key fields on the photo side of a Hong Kong (China) identity card, including name in Chinese, name in English, telecode for name, date of birth, gender, document symbol, date of the first issue, date of the last receipt, identity card number, and permanent residency attribute. It can check for card authenticity and crop the identity photo.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.HKIDCardOCRSync(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.HKIDCardOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to recognize key fields on the photo side of a Hong Kong (China) identity card, including name in Chinese, name in English, telecode for name, date of birth, gender, document symbol, date of the first issue, date of the last receipt, identity card number, and permanent residency attribute. It can check for card authenticity and crop the identity photo.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.MLIDCardOCR(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.MLIDCardOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to recognize a Malaysian identity card, including identity card number, name, gender, and address. It is also used to crop identity photos and give alarms for photographed or photocopied certificates.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.MLIDCardOCRSync(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.MLIDCardOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to recognize a Malaysian identity card, including identity card number, name, gender, and address. It is also used to crop identity photos and give alarms for photographed or photocopied certificates.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.MLIDPassportOCR(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.MLIDPassportOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to recognize a passport issued in Hong Kong/Macao/Taiwan (China) or other countries/regions. Recognizable fields include passport ID, name, date of birth, gender, expiration date, issuing country/region, and nationality. It has the features of cropping identity photos and alarming for photographed or photocopied documents.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.MLIDPassportOCRSync(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.MLIDPassportOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to recognize a passport issued in Hong Kong/Macao/Taiwan (China) or other countries/regions. Recognizable fields include passport ID, name, date of birth, gender, expiration date, issuing country/region, and nationality. It has the features of cropping identity photos and alarming for photographed or photocopied documents.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.TableOCR(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TableOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to detect and recognize Chinese and English forms in images. It can return the text content of each cell and save the recognition result as Excel.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.OcrClient.TableOCRSync(TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TableOCRRequest)
member.summary:
This API is used to detect and recognize Chinese and English forms in images. It can return the text content of each cell and save the recognition result as Excel.
This API is not fully available for the time being. For more information, please contact your [Tencent Cloud sales rep](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/contact-sales).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.ImageBase64
member.summary: Base64-encoded value of the image. The image cannot exceed 7 MB after being Base64-encoded. A resolution above 500 x 800 is recommended. PNG, JPG, JPEG, and BMP formats are supported. It is recommended that the card part occupy more than 2/3 area of the image. Either the `ImageUrl` or `ImageBase64` of the image must be provided. If both are provided, only `ImageUrl` will be used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.ImageUrl
member.summary: URL address of image. (This field is not supported outside Chinese mainland) Supported image formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG. GIF is currently not supported. Supported image size: the downloaded image cannot exceed 7 MB after being Base64-encoded. The download time of the image cannot exceed 3 seconds. We recommend you store the image in Tencent Cloud, as a Tencent Cloud URL can guarantee higher download speed and stability. The download speed and stability of non-Tencent Cloud URLs may be low.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.RetBorderCutImage
member.summary: Whether to return the bank card image data after preprocessing (precise cropping and alignment). Default value: `false`

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.RetCardNoImage
member.summary: Whether to return the card number image data after slicing. Default value: `false`

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.EnableCopyCheck
member.summary: Whether to enable photocopy check. If the input image is a bank card photocopy, an alarm will be returned. Default value: `false`

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.EnableReshootCheck
member.summary: Whether to enable photograph check. If the input image is a bank card photograph, an alarm will be returned. Default value: `false`

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.EnableBorderCheck
member.summary: Whether to enable obscured border check. If the input image is a bank card with obscured border, an alarm will be returned. Default value: `false`

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.EnableQualityValue
member.summary: Whether to return the image quality value, which measures how clear an image is. Default value: `false`

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.CardNo
member.summary: Card number

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.BankInfo
member.summary: Bank information

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.ValidDate
member.summary: Expiration date. Format: 07/2023

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.CardType
member.summary: Card type

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.CardName
member.summary: Card name

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.BorderCutImage
member.summary: Sliced image data Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.CardNoImage
member.summary: Card number image data Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.WarningCode
member.summary: Warning code: -9110: the bank card date is invalid. -9111: the bank card border is incomplete. -9112: the bank card image is reflective. -9113: the bank card image is a photocopy. -9114: the bank card image is a photograph. Multiple warning codes may be returned at a time. Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.QualityValue
member.summary: Image quality value, which is returned when `EnableQualityValue` is set to `true`. The smaller the value, the less clear the image is. Value range: 0−100 (a threshold greater than or equal to 50 is recommended.) Note: This field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.BankCardOCRResponse.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.summary: Horizontal coordinate

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.Coord.Y
member.summary: Vertical coordinate

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.DetectedWordCoordPoint.WordCoordinate
member.summary: Coordinates of a word’s four corners in a clockwise order on the input image, starting from the upper-left corner

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.summary: Confidence. Value range: 0–100

member.summary: A possible character

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest.ImageBase64
member.summary: Base64-encoded value of image. The image cannot exceed 7 MB in size after being Base64-encoded. A resolution above 600x800 is recommended. PNG, JPG, JPEG, and BMP formats are supported. Either `ImageUrl` or `ImageBase64` of the image must be provided; if both are provided, only `ImageUrl` will be used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest.ImageUrl
member.summary: URL address of image. (This field is not supported outside Chinese mainland) The image cannot exceed 7 MB after being Base64-encoded. A resolution above 600x800 is recommended. PNG, JPG, JPEG, and BMP formats are supported. We recommend you store the image in Tencent Cloud, as a Tencent Cloud URL can guarantee higher download speed and stability. The download speed and stability of non-Tencent Cloud URLs may be low.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest.IsWords
member.summary: Whether to return the character information. Default value: `false`

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest.EnableDetectSplit
member.summary: Whether to slice the input image to enhance the recognition effects for scenarios where the whole image is big, but the size of a single character is small (e.g., test papers). This feature is disabled by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest.IsPdf
member.summary: Whether to enable PDF recognition. Default value: `false`. If you enable this feature, both images and PDF files can be recognized.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest.PdfPageNumber
member.summary: Number of a PDF page that needs to be recognized. Currently, only one single page can be recognized. This parameter takes effect only if a PDF file is uploaded and `IsPdf` is set to `true`. Default value: `1`

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRResponse.TextDetections
member.summary: Information on recognized text, including the text line content, confidence, text line coordinates, and text line coordinates after rotation correction. For more information, please click the link on the left.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRResponse.Angel
member.summary: Image rotation angle in degrees. 0°: The horizontal direction of the text on the image; a positive value: rotate clockwise; a negative value: rotate counterclockwise.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralAccurateOCRResponse.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest.ImageBase64
member.summary: Base64-encoded value of image/PDF. The image/PDF cannot exceed 7 MB after being Base64-encoded. A resolution above 600x800 is recommended. PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, and PDF formats are supported.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest.ImageUrl
member.summary: URL address of image/PDF. (This field is not supported outside Chinese mainland) The image/PDF cannot exceed 7 MB after being Base64-encoded. A resolution above 600x800 is recommended. PNG, JPG, JPEG, BMP, and PDF formats are supported. We recommend you store the image in Tencent Cloud, as a Tencent Cloud URL can guarantee higher download speed and stability. The download speed and stability of non-Tencent Cloud URLs may be low.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest.Scene
member.summary: Reserved field.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest.LanguageType
member.summary: Language to recognize The language can be automatically recognized or manually specified. Chinese-English mix (`zh`) is selected by default. Mixed characters in English and each supported language can be recognized together. Valid values: `zh`: Chinese-English mix `zh_rare`: supports letters, digits, rare Chinese characters, Traditional Chinese characters, special characters, etc. `auto` `mix`: language mix `jap`: Japanese `kor`: Korean `spa`: Spanish `fre`: French `ger`: German `por`: Portuguese `vie`: Vietnamese `may`: Malay `rus`: Russian `ita`: Italian `hol`: Dutch `swe`: Swedish `fin`: Finnish `dan`: Danish `nor`: Norwegian `hun`: Hungarian `tha`: Thai `hi`: Hindi `ara`: Arabic

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest.IsPdf
member.summary: Whether to enable PDF recognition. Default value: false. After this feature is enabled, both images and PDF files can be recognized at the same time.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest.PdfPageNumber
member.summary: Page number of the PDF page that needs to be recognized. Only one single PDF page can be recognized. This parameter is valid if the uploaded file is a PDF and the value of the `IsPdf` parameter is `true`. Default value: 1.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest.IsWords
member.summary: Whether to return the character information. Default value: `false`

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRResponse.TextDetections
member.summary: Information of recognized text, including the text line content, confidence, text line coordinates, and text line coordinates after rotation correction. For more information, please click the link on the left.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRResponse.Language
member.summary: Detected language. For more information on the supported languages, please see the description of the `LanguageType` input parameter.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRResponse.Angel
member.summary: Image rotation angle in degrees. 0°: The horizontal direction of the text on the image; a positive value: rotate clockwise; a negative value: rotate counterclockwise.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRResponse.PdfPageSize
member.summary: Total number of PDF pages to be returned if the image is a PDF. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.GeneralBasicOCRResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.MLIDPassportOCRRequest.ImageBase64
member.summary: Base64-encoded value of image. The image cannot exceed 7 MB in size after being Base64-encoded. A resolution above 500x800 is recommended. PNG, JPG, JPEG, and BMP formats are supported. It is recommended that the card part occupies more than 2/3 area of the image.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.MLIDPassportOCRRequest.RetImage
member.summary: Whether to return an image. Default value: false.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TableOCRRequest.ImageBase64
member.summary: Base64-encoded value of image. Supported image formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG. GIF is not supported at present. Supported image size: the downloaded image cannot exceed 3 MB in size after being Base64-encoded. The download time of the image cannot exceed 3 seconds. Either `ImageUrl` or `ImageBase64` of the image must be provided; if both are provided, only `ImageUrl` will be used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TableOCRRequest.ImageUrl
member.summary: URL address of image. (This field is not supported outside Chinese mainland) Supported image formats: PNG, JPG, JPEG. GIF is currently not supported. Supported image size: the downloaded image cannot exceed 3 MB after being Base64-encoded. The download time of the image cannot exceed 3 seconds. We recommend you store the image in Tencent Cloud, as a Tencent Cloud URL can guarantee higher download speed and stability. The download speed and stability of non-Tencent Cloud URLs may be low.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TextDetection.DetectedText
member.summary: Recognized text line content.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TextDetection.Confidence
member.summary: Confidence. Value range: 0–100.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TextDetection.Polygon
member.summary: Text line coordinates, which are represented as 4 vertex coordinates. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TextDetection.AdvancedInfo
member.summary: Extended field. The paragraph information `Parag` returned by the `GeneralBasicOcr` API contains `ParagNo`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TextDetection.ItemPolygon
member.summary: Pixel coordinates of the text line in the image after rotation correction, which is in the format of `(X-coordinate of top-left point, Y-coordinate of top-left point, width, height)`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TextDetection.Words
member.summary: Information about a character, including the character itself and its confidence. Supported APIs: `GeneralBasicOCR`, `GeneralAccurateOCR`

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ocr.V20181119.Models.TextDetection.WordCoordPoint
member.summary: Coordinates of a word’s four corners on the input image. Supported APIs: `GeneralBasicOCR`, `GeneralAccurateOCR`
